summary: ChatGPT is an AI chatbot that can talk like a human and was made by OpenAI. It is based on a very large language model called GPT-3.5. ChatGPT can have conversations and give answers in different styles and languages. It has become very popular, with over 100 million users in just two months. People are worried about its potential negative effects, like replacing human intelligence or spreading misinformation. ChatGPT is now a freemium service, with paid subscriptions offering extra features like image generation. It has also led to the creation of similar AI chatbots by other companies.
title: ChatGPT
